text: The Cumans, also known as Kumans, were a group of travelling Turkic people who lived in the area along the Black Sea near the Volga River, the Balkans, and Hungary. The city Kumanovo in the Southeast European country North Macedonia is named after them. ==Related pages== * Sakas * Kipchaks * Sogdiana * Scythians ==Footnotes== ==References== Category:Middle Ages Category:Nomadic people Category:History of Europe
title: Cumans
